mapper.select: SELECT CONCAT(qk.fTerminalType, '_', qk.fWebsiteType, '_', qk.fDataProcessingStatus) FROM t_qz_keyword_rank_info qk WHERE qk.fQZSettingUuid = #{qzSettingUuid} AND qk.fWebsiteType = "aiZhan" UNION ALL SELECT CONCAT(qk.fTerminalType, '_', qk.fWebsiteType, '_', qk.fDataProcessingStatus) FROM t_qz_keyword_rank_info qk WHERE qk.fQZSettingUuid = #{qzSettingUuid} AND qk.fWebsiteType = "5118" GROUP BY qk.fTerminalType

SELECT qk.fUuid AS 'uuid', qk.fQZSettingUuid AS 'qzSettingUuid', qk.fTerminalType AS 'terminalType', qk.fWebsiteType AS 'websiteType', qk.fDataProcessingStatus AS 'dataProcessingStatus', qk.fDate AS 'date', qk.fTopTen AS 'topTen', qk.fTopTwenty AS 'topTwenty', qk.fTopThirty AS 'topThirty', qk.fTopForty AS 'topForty', qk.fTopFifty AS 'topFifty', qk.fCreateTopTenNum AS 'createTopTenNum', qk.fCreateTopFiftyNum AS 'createTopFiftyNum' FROM t_qz_keyword_rank_info qk WHERE qk.fQZSettingUuid = #{qzSettingUuid} AND qk.fTerminalType = #{terminalType} AND qk.fWebsiteType = 'designationWord' LIMIT 1
